snippet: Wayne LaPierre, the public face of the National Rifle Association, implored members never to give up their weapons in the wake of recent gun control efforts.
abstract: National Rifle Association executive vice president Wayne R LaPierre addresses members at Houston convention, imploring them not to give up their guns in wake of recent gun control efforts; organization leadership is warning or 'all-out historic attacks' on gun owners' rights.
lead_paragraph: Wayne LaPierre, the public face of the National Rifle Association, implored members never to give up their weapons in the wake of recent gun control efforts.

headline.seo: N.R.A. Officials Issue Rallying Cry for Midterm Elections
headline.main: N.R.A. Leadership Rallies Members for 2014 Elections
headline.print_headline: N.R.A. Leadership Rallies Members for 2014 Elections
